item.title: China targets 2 Lithuanian banks in response to new EU sanctions
item.description: China is imposing sanctions on two Lithuanian banks in what it says is retaliation for the European Union's inclusion of two Chinese financial institu...

item.title: Vietnam wants to be the next Asian tiger and it’s overhauling its economy
item.description: Vietnam is launching its biggest economic overhaul in a generation, aiming to become Asia’s next “tiger economy.”

item.description: Shares have advanced in Asia after the U.S. stock market rallied to records when data showed inflation across the United States improved slightly last...

item.title: VA hospitals are finding it harder to fill jobs, watchdog says
item.description: An independent watchdog for the Department of Veterans Affairs says VA hospitals have reported an increase in severe staffing shortages

item.title: US July budget deficit up 20% year-over-year despite record Trump tariff income
item.description: The U.S. has seen a record increase in tariff income, with a 273% rise in customs revenue from last year
